title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 14 - Construction, Installation, Inspection And Maintenance Of High Pressure Boilers; Construction Of Unfired Pressure Vessels
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 14 - Construction, Installation, Inspection And Maintenance Of High Pressure Boilers; Construction Of Unfired Pressure Vessels

State Regulations

Subpart 14-1 - Definitions (§ 14-1.1 to 14-1.19)

Subpart 14-2 - Inspection (§ 14-2.1 to 14-2.14)

Subpart 14-3 - Repairs, Alterations And Miscellaneous Requirements

Subpart 14-4 - Reinstallation Of Boilers (§ 14-4.1 to 14-4.3 to 14-4.4)

Subpart 14-5 - Heating Of Liquids (§ 14-5.1 to 14-5.3 to 14-5.11)

Subpart 14-6 - Removal Of Waste Gases From Boilers (§ 14-6.1 to 14-6.3)

Subpart 14-7 - Forced Circulation Boilers (§ 14-7.1 to 14-7.2)

Subpart 14-8 - Standard Tolerance Of Tube Bends (§ 14-8.1 to 14-8.2)

Subpart 14-9 - Power Boilers: New Installations

Subpart 14-10 - Power Boilers: Existing Installations

Subpart 14-11 - Miniature Boilers

Subpart 14-12 - Repealed

Subpart 14-13 - Repealed

Subpart 14-14 - Repealed

Subpart 14-15 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 14

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §§27, 204

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
